name: Lucozade Alert
description:
This Lucozade Alert game is the first game I have been contracted to make It was created for Gamerfest 2022, and Lucozade Alert where the main sponsors of the event how to play:
  • insrt your name in the main menu and hit play
  • hold your finger on the screen and the hand will follow it
  • collect lucozade cans
  • avoid battereies before they zap your energy
Project lead and Programmer: Jamie Game Art : Kim
